text: Šiauliai is the fourth-largest city in Lithuania. In 2016 about 102,000 people lived in the city. From 1994 to 2010 it was the capital of Šiauliai County. ==Twin towns – Sister cities== Šiauliai is twinned with: * Khmelnytsky, Ukraine * Częstochowa, Poland * Omaha, United States * Baranovichi, Belarus * Fredericia, Denmark * Jelgava, Latvia * Kaliningrad, Russia * Kristianstad, Sweden * Pärnu, Estonia * Etten-Leur, Netherlands * Plauen, Germany ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Cities in Lithuania
title: Šiauliai
